snippet: Mark Parker, Mr. Knight’s choice for chairman, has been president and chief executive of the company since 2006.
abstract: Nike co-founder and chairman Philip H Knight will step down, saying he wants position to fall to current president and chief executive Mark Parker.
lead_paragraph: Mark Parker, Mr. Knight’s choice for chairman, has been president and chief executive of the company since 2006.

headline.main: Nike Chairman Philip Knight, Set to Exit, Wants Chief as Successor
headline.print_headline: Nike Chairman, Set to Exit, Wants Chief as Successor
